main event: Two men reported simultaneously hearing a roar and observing two circular objects of undetermined size, several miles distant at a great height in Salmon Dam, Idaho, on 13 August 1947.
interesting points: The objects were reported to be traveling at great speed and reflected light.
The descriptions of the objects varied widely from other reported incidents on the same day.
There is an absence of evidence in the report to refute the assumption that the objects were two ordinary aircraft at too great a distance to discern details.
sighted object: two circular objects at a great height
